title: Ndamukong Suh Joins The Show
description:
Ndamukong Suh joins Laura Rutledge and the NFL Live Crew to discuss his possible destinations for the 2022 season, the Rams 2022 season outlook, What Russell Wilson’s addition means for the Broncos, McLaurin and Metcalf miss mini camp while waiting on new deals, and Ndamukong shares his list of the toughest offensive lineman in the league. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: NFL Live: Ndamukong Suh joins the show and does Russell Wilson make the Broncos a contender?
